alert.note: Alert for Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:25PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Feliciana, northern Pointe Coupee, west central East Feliciana Parishes in southeastern Louisiana and southwestern Wilkinson Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 524 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lettsworth, or 12 miles east of Simmesport, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, St. Francisville, Wakefield, Lettsworth, Spillman and Batchelor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
